name: Aryh - The Forgotten Spectre
description:
Aryh - The Forgotten Spectre is a pixel-style action platformer game. Run, jump, dash and slash your enemies to save the world from the Hollows.

The evil necromancer opened the portals of hell and sent several creatures on Earth. Aryh, the forgotten spectre is the last hope.

Gameplay:

Explore the scenario, defeat enemies, collect gold, find chests on hidden walls.

You must evolve your character and equip spells to face higher level monsters.

9 Worlds:

Your journey begins on the ground and you will find the necromancer at the bottom of the purgatory.

9 BOSSES:

Each boss brings his difficulty, it will be a challenge to defeat everyone.

UNLOCK DIFFERENT SPELLS:

Your best friend is your sword, but you can, and should, equip spells to face enemies.

-GAMEPAD COMPATIBLE

Supported languages: English, Portuguese.
